metadata.title: Eric Suzuki - Full Stack Web Developer
metadata.description: Product Engineer experienced with complex Software-as-a-Service platforms, specializing in front-end architecture and building pixel-perfect, customized UI component libraries

paragraphs.1: I'm a Product Engineer experienced with complex Software-as-a-Service platforms, specializing in building, optimizing and testing front-end features, architecture and pixel-perfect component libraries from the ground up using SOLID programming principles. The source code for this portfolio can be found in the Github link below.
paragraphs.2: In the past decade, I've worked with some trailblazing blockchain-related companies such as Gemini and Freeport and my career has featured Web 3 projects prominently. I'm a major geek, sci-fi fan and film aficionado, and my other hobbies and interests include metaphysics, religion, classic rock and literature.

paragraphs.1: AKAMI is a mobile astrology app that provides daily horoscopes, natal chart readings and other astrological services.
paragraphs.2: This solo development project was a great opportunity to learn about mobile development and the React Native and Apple Developer ecosystem. I built the app from the ground up, including the UI, API integration and state management.

achievements.2: Generates daily horoscopes using OpenAI's GPT-4o model

paragraphs.1: Blockscope is a Web3 data platform that enables anyone interested in on-chain data to quickly spin up live or historical data pipelines.
paragraphs.2: During my time at the company, I built new features for their core products and improved several others.

achievements.4: Created Custom SVG icons made in Adobe Illustrator
achievements.5: Built Web3 Hacks Directory Dashboard and pages
achievements.6: Redesigned and refactored Trace Call Tree, Web3 Entities Directory Pages, Decode visibility charts and data tables

paragraphs.1: Freeport was a Fractionalized Art Ownership Model Powered by Blockchain. Freeport was featured in ARTnews and enjoyed notability until late 2023.
paragraphs.2: During my time at Freeport I worked closely with their co-founder and built several features, working primarily on their internal blog and KYC systems.

achievements.2: Built the Tailwind CSS configuration file
achievements.3: Built blog and pagination system using Contentful's API
achievements.4: Refactors to Contentful data parsing files
achievements.5: Translated designs from Figma into Next.js
achievements.6: Integrated React Hook Forms into their KYC system
achievements.7: Integrated Google Places API and parsed geolocation data
achievements.8: Wrote Zod data schemas for form validation

paragraphs.1: BITRIA was a digital turnkey asset management startup for cryptocurrencies, a platform we built that was eventually acquired by Gemini Trust Company, LLC is an American cryptocurrency exchange and custodian bank. The platform remained active until 2024 when it was assimilated into Gemini's larger ecosystem.
paragraphs.2: I joined the company early and helped to modernize and refactor much of the front-end architecture. I also built many new UI elements, improved existing ones and had ownership of several features.

achievements.1: Refactored class components into functional components
achievements.2: Several refactors to state management and context API files
achievements.4: Created Custom SVG icons made in Adobe Illustrator
achievements.9: Wrote unit tests and Storybook components
achievements.10: Reviewed code on Github and participated in kanban-style project management

paragraphs.1: From 2013 to 2016 I worked variously with small businesses, web development agencies and events companies as both a freelance web developer and project manager.
paragraphs.2: During that time I worked primarily with Wordpress and related plugins, and plain HTML/CSS.

achievements.1: As a project manager, upheld and deadlines of deliverables and projects for more than 30 agency clients
achievements.2: Mentored a small team of web designers in the design and publishing of responsive Wordpress webpages
achievements.3: Participated in meetings with various agency clients to discuss and clarify website requirements
achievements.4: Invoiced, billed and corresponded with various personal clients
achievements.5: Built promotional materials for various themed blockbuster exhibits and live entertainment productions
